messages.msgSnippet: http://www.yankeeclassic.com/miskatonic/dcommunications/films/thefilms00. htm#Title Here s another attempt to send that link (to the list of Lovecraft films)
messages.messageBody:
http://www.yankeeclassic.com/miskatonic/dcommunications/films/thefilms00.
htm#Title

Here's another attempt to send that link (to the list of Lovecraft films)
and if this one is truncated I'll send a tiny url. Sorry about that.

I wanted to add about "Berkeley Square"... some may be thinking of the
Henry James story "The Sense of the Past" and I think the film was said
to be based on that story or a play based on that story when it was
released. The connections to Lovecraft come from a letter he wrote a
friend after seeing the film and from his story "The Case of Charles
Dexter Ward" written in 1928. (?)

Like I said, a lot of the movies are shamefully, loosely based on
Lovecraft stories. <g>
Deb Lewis
